bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Conformance Test Procedures for Service Interoperability in Ethernet Passive Optical Networks, IEEE Std 1904.1, Package C
IEEE Draft Standard for Conformance Test Procedures for Service Interoperability in Ethernet Passive Optical Networks, IEEE Std 1904.1, Package C

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies a suite of conformance tests for system-level requirements of Ethernet Passive Optical Network (EPON) equipment, defined in IEEE Std 1904.1, Package C.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
